subject: Basketball
Free Agents (Sports)
lead_paragraph: If LeBron James were to leave the Cavaliers as a free agent in 2010, he’d be going against an N.B.A. system that rewards superstars for staying put and punishes them for leaving.
snippet: If LeBron James were to leave the Cavaliers as a free agent in 2010, he’d be going against an N.B.A. system that rewards superstars for staying put and punishes them for leaving.
